## ResolverBuilder.callback() method

Creates a resolver that invokes a callback function for every dependency resolution request, allowing custom logic to return the dependency.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
callback(value: ResolveCallback<K>): Resolver<K>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | [ResolveCallback](./fast-foundation.resolvecallback.md)<!-- -->&lt;K&gt; | The callback to call during resolution. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Resolver](./fast-foundation.resolver.md)<!-- -->&lt;K&gt;

The resolver.
